content: this text is about a civil case heard in the marijampolė district court the case involves two parties referred to as vs and ss the court has determined that a peugeot 307 and a volvo are the personal property of vs while a mercedes benz 190 belongs to ss the court has also declared that funds held in bank accounts are associated with each respective vehicle the applicant vs is seeking to dissolve their marriage with ss and claim their personal property they argue that the marriage has deteriorated and they have been living separately since 2000 ss disagrees and has lodged a counterclaim seeking the dissolution of the marriage on grounds of fault by vs witnesses have provided testimony supporting both parties claims the court must determine fault for the dissolution of the marriage and divide the assets accordingly the court has upheld vss claims and rejected sss counterclaim ss has been ordered to pay various costs and expenses including stamp duty lawyers fees registered postage costs and costs for account statements the total amount ss needs to pay is €34581

metadata.cost: 130 EUR (stamp duty) + 150 EUR (legal fees) + 65.81 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
